title: Cornel West: Sharpton Sold Soul for Obama

comments.text:
This show is nothing but shock and awe commentary and not news. It panders 
to controversy and soundbites.﻿
comments.author: The Engineer

comments.text:
Obama is a liar a war criminal nothing has that man to compare to FDR. 
Obama is a shame of not only the US but human race! Libya, Iraq, Ukraine, 
and in the shadow of the death of thousands in a failed state created by 
Obama Libya, Yemen, Iraq, Syria and now Ukraine. US is in turmoil lost all 
morals as Bush and his dad and Obama with the Clintons wanted to build a 
castle on pillars of sand and it collapses as a country and society 
collapses that built on lies. Obama? Gave democracy to Libya he was very 
proud after he bombed destroyed the richest African country and turn it 
into a land of savages. Peace prize? War and Death prize. We lost Aaron 
Swartz and many others thanks to this man. Sorry for the people of US not 
just blacks, whites all americans as you are lied, tricked and used and 
your fake leaders are giving a very bad reputation to you and destroying 
many lives around the world causing great damage due to their violent war 
policies. It is coming to catch up with you as you are weak to get united 
and serve justice and peace. You are weak and divided. I am sorry for you 
americans and also I am afraid of your insane leaders as they have their 
hands on dirty weapons that should not even exist. Obama? Bush? Poppy Bush? 
Bandar Bush? Clintons? They all have no guts to tell you the truth about 
9/11 as the truth is so ugly and they afraid of the truth as the truth 
always prevails sooner or later but they will be destroyed by their coward 
guilty silence and lies. No not one president should be name after JFK as 
there was no president of the USA after JFK. These guys are crooks coward 
liars. Jet Fuel isn't it? Its an insult for me and the public to even 
assume that we are so dumb we believe all your stupid weak lies like Jet 
Fuel fire... you should have known better that state such a ridiculous 
nonsense. Facts and physics never lies. CIA highjacked all for sale 
dictatorship country where all is nothing but profit is God. Matter over 
mind...see if that will work and for how long? I speak 5 languages and 
watching these 5 nations Spain, Germany, England, Russia, Hungary. Its bad 
news for liars in the US as we are not stupid and we know our history you 
cannot fool us. This game is not yet over but US already lost it, long time 
ago. Money can't buy you love! And you don't need the weathermen to tell 
you from which way the wind blows!
Its a sad joy of knowledge and I am not happy to see what I see and will 
see!
God Bless America, The Constitution and the Oath-keepers!﻿

comments.author: Quillbro Durdus

comments.text:
Cornell west, stop it! Your critique of Obama is an off base perception. 
You've have had blacks in congress for years, and they have done nothing. 
We now have a black president of the United States, and many of these black 
politicians wish to shift blame to him. Where the hell have they been all 
along? He is the president of the unites states, not the president of the 
black community. Additionally, how many young blacks have taken advantage 
of the educational tax credit, and with the healthcare, do you realize how 
many people black white and the like now have health care? Come to my 
state, and see he difference he has made. You offer no solutions, just 
critique.. And shave please! ﻿
comments.author: Dsky40

comments.text:
First of all you will never see a black president in the United States for 
at least another 100 years.  

Second of all, even if you did have one, you will never get an American 
president who caters to the blacks for two simple reasons.

1. The United States is predominately white and will never support a 
president who is a race-hustler or speaks about African American injustices 
, etc, in the 21st century.

2. Most blacks want special privilege, not equal rights. They already have 
equal rights, most are just too damn ignorant to realize it.  There is 
nothing to pander to.  ﻿
comments.author: AroundSun

comments.text:
+Clarence White were not talking about drugs you illiterate moron. Were 
talking about violent crimes!!!! So..the fact that they committ more crimes 
is somehow the fault of a public defender?? Blacks are arrested for drugs 
more often because maybe they committ more crimes!!! They are also more 
likely to be out in public using instead of being at home..there are more 
poor whites that cant afford 'high priced attorneys' anyway so your whole 
theory is bunk
comments.author: AroundSun

comments.text:
+AroundSun Uses the term "Social Justice Warriors". Immediately signals he 
is one of THOSE people and should be automatically ignored to save time.
comments.author: BollocksUtwat

comments.text:
You're glossing over the fact that their initial conviction which put them 
on parole or probation was fair considering most can't afford a high priced 
attorney and had to go with a Public Pretender who works for the state. 
Black males are 4× more likely to get arrested for marijuana possession 
than White males. Drugs between the races are done at the same rate. Look, 
the system is designed to lockup Black Males, check FBI crime stats. Last 
year both were at 4,000 murders, I agree per capita is an issue but there 
are many factors that can tell the story. Do your research before you say 
that the majority of violent crimes are mostly committed by Blacks. Just 
don't equate the mishaps of some and change your verbiage to most, that's 
unfair to us as a race and if you look hard enough you can find a lot of 
sadistic White People out there that had the full benefits of an 
educational system, no racial profiling, and at least starting off life in 
a middle class family.
comments.author: Clarence White

comments.text:
+Clarence White That's another bullshit myth perpetuated by the same 
idiotic social justice warriors who claim that Mike Brown's hands were up! 
 The reason blacks are more likely to receive long sentences is simply 
because they are also more likely to be on parole, probation, and have 
prior convictions, etc. This makes sense since they makeup about 12-14% of 
the population and are responsible for over 40% of the violent crimes in 
this country.  But more importantly, you are doing what so many others do, 
which is glossing over the fact that they have committed a crime in the 
first place.  Instead of lambasting at the crimes to begin with, you want 
to argue sentencing lol.
comments.author: AroundSun

comments.text:
I'm tired of hearing the most Black People comments like you sat down and 
had dinner with every Black family. Equal rights ain't a prison population 
overflowing with Black Men and Women for non violent crimes while other 
races, mainly Whites, get different sentences for the same crimes.

comments.author: kevin Rice

comments.text:
Just keep in mind that Obama's supposed to fuck up on purpose. It's 
actually the job assigned to him. Keep your eye on 2016 for the same plan. 
Since JFK, no president has worked for the country. They are all assigned 
the job by the fed reserve (look up how they came to be) . It's all TV.

The crazy thing is how they made us Black people look terrible because we 
(although not myself) fall for anything with a similar skin color, like 
Sharpton, so they all go back to sleep and calm while the country is being 
fucked up, laws are changing against us, surveillance, drones in our own 
skies, people being put in prison for cash and no one's outrage because 
they are too busy watching fake ass loser reality shows and dumb ass 
repetitive music.

We have the technology out here to look beyond garbage TV now. We can get 
real info, even in real time, unfiltered - unlike the stations owned by the 
same few. They can play with emotions, make us laugh, cry, and even fear 
(the word 'terrorist' used over and over or even creating a terror attack). 
Black people, this has been going on for years and its the same shit! Obama 
is not your brother. He's not your master. He's not MLK. He is and always 
will be the tool they set up after everyone had it with the last guy. It 
will be the same in 2016, 2020, and beyond until they won't need to play 
the republican/democrat role anymore because they got you where they want 
you (George Carlin - This Country Is Finished) and you can't move - all of 
us - any nationality.

JFK has a video where he warns the public about this days before he got 
assassinated. Look it up and listen clearly when he talks about secret 
societies in this country.﻿
comments.author: CeaselessOne

comments.text:
all these so called black leaders are putting on a show talking loud and 
saying nothing they remind me of the democrats and the republicans acting

like your trying to help black people do me a favor all of you shut up all 
of you full of shit cause behind close doors your counting the money you 
made for selling the black people a dream we can't live off so called 
speeches you make who put you in charge anyway we didn't vote for you most 
of us young blacks never heard of you until your big mouth gets extra time

back while you live in the finest neighborhood eat finest food charlie 
rangle 3 condos I don't even listen to yall on the air waves when you start 
your game I don't see none of yall living in poverty all you so called 
black leaders sold out I hope the most High god of abraham Isaac and Jacob 
punish you all for doing this to us your worst than the white man all of 
you should be in hell for doing this to us black people its time to say no 
to these poverty pimps their all in it together living off the blood and 
sweat of the poor people pray for these people to be remove out of our 
sight the power is in prayer of our god of abraham Isaac and Jacob do it 
don't pray to their gods these black sell out are on satin side they 
already sold their soul for money﻿
comments.author: Calvin Moe

comments.text: Were the captions written by a Japanese person???﻿
comments.author: richie1957aus normanbates' mom

comments.text:
Obama ain't no Black president; Black people don't think or behave like 
this dude. The dude has completely disappointed me. The dude acts as if 
he's constantly trying to please a group of assholes that have him under 
pressure like: 'see, I did this thing that you like, Mr. White man, 
hehe:):):)!'.
The dude has no fucking balls. The fact is, if you're the president of a 
nation, and a fucking sector of the nation has it worse than others, it is 
your fucking DUTY, as the leader, to see that things are balanced out 
-- It's not a Black-people-president thing at this point !!!!!!!! It 
doesn't fucking matter who else prior to you has NEGLECTED that sector (you 
don't have to follow them), you as a leader MUST express your OWN 
leadership.

I heard the dude say the other day: "I will hunt and destroy anyone who so 
much as to 'threaten' America". Are you fucking kidding me?? A such 
statement CANNOT be rooted in wisdom; and it certainly does not reflect the 
thought process of a Black person.

Ever since the dude became president, finding a job has become an 
exhaustive undertaking, to the point that people simply give up. The number 
of homeless people have augmented exponentially. And jobs that used to be 
leftovers which would normally go to the uneducated aliens are now being 
fought over by Whites with degrees. Entrepreneurs can no longer make a 
fucking decent profit nor withstand the competition posed my corporations. 
The dude completely mismanaged over 2,000,000,000,000 dollars he received 
early in his presidency in futuristic bullshit, when folks needed the 
relief right away, and still DO. The costs of goods (and food) have gone up 
overwhelmingly... IT'S A FUCKING MESS IN THIS COUNTRY NOW.﻿

comments.text:
If Rev. Al Sharpton is involved in ANY interview, then you know that it is 
NOT news, but more rather spin of some sort. Why hasn't this false prophet

fake. I guess being a FBI informer has its perks. He's really great at 
turning any reason thrown toward him into a scrappy fight. Rev. Al has 
never done anything that has impressed me. If I was really stupid and 
thought this guy represented the Black American population then I would 
hate black people- but I don't knowing that he is a big bullshit artist.

blacks and whites are truly integrated, then the color of ones leader 
wouldn't be an issue. But I guess I'm dreaming again.﻿

comments.text:

comments.author: mcclin m

comments.text:
I do not entirely agree with all of dr. Wests critisism of obama but he is 
right on a lot of points. 
Sharpton and other black leaders are hypocrites because they used to 
critisize Bush (rightly so) for not doing anything AT ALL for the black 
community and now Obama is following the exact same policies as his 
predecesor, yet now they are all quit! He should be critisized on that as 
well even though he himself is part black. In glad there are people who are 
always consistent like dr. West. He actually seems not let race get the 
better of his judgement
comments.author: MRostendway

comments.text:
Dr. West wants him to stop killing people with drone attacks, dropping 
bombs on 50 people to kill 1 person. Dr. West stands by his principles to 
the point where he has publicly said he was wrong for supporting Obama and 
that he is just another puppet of the oligarchy. 

Dr. West is about helping black people of course, but the message he is 
sending is to all of us. Stand up for what you believe no matter how 
unpopular, no matter how you are treated for it. Never sell out your soul 
for popularity. Think, consider your fellow man and do not become victim of 
dehumanizing propaganda that turns us into puppets to the will of a 
military industrial complex that feeds only itself.

Just my take I suppose, but I listen to alot of Dr. West. You cant sound 
byte him, his points are too deep. Listen to a whole lecture and learn what 
he really has to say.

And when Bush was president they were there even louder, sorry that you 
introduced yourself to him so late, catch up!
comments.author: ShadowSandy

comments.text:
What do you expect Obama to do with a Congress that actively undermines him 
at every turn.  I don't deny that there are plenty of places to have a 
tough discussion/debate on issues, but Obama can't pass a jobs bill by 
himself and we've seen what the House is all about now.  If you want change 
you're not going to accomplish it by trolling youtube and ranting in a 
comment.  I admit that I'm not sure as to why the opposition hates him so 
much.  I'm hesitant to go down that race road even though that's what I 
think personally. If you are not actively volunteering with a political 
group that advocates for your causes and writing letters to congressman and 
going to rallies and block walking and registering voters then you've sold 
out.  My theory is that people expect Obama to work magic because it seemed 
like such a miracle that we were able to elect him in the first place.  
People seemed to think that their job was done after the elections.  
Democracy is a full time job if you're a citizen and you can't take it for 
granted. ﻿
